name: Ironclads: High Seas
description: For over a year the forces of the United States of America (Northern States) and the Confederates States of America (Southern States) have fought a bitter war. In 1862 the governments of Great Britain, France and Spain recognize the Southern States to secure raw materials. The Souths economy becomes dependent on trade with Europe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7Processor: Pentium 4 / Athlon 1.1 GHz or betterMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: 128 MB GeForce 6600 / RADEON 9600 or betterDirectX®: DirectX 9.0CHard Drive: Sound: DirectX Compatible/16-bit sound PCI
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7Processor: Pentium 4 / Athlon 2.4 GHz or betterMemory: 1024 MB RAM or aboveGraphics: 256 MB GeForce 7600 / RADEON x1600 or betterDirectX®: DirectX 9.0CHard Drive: Sound: DirectX Compatible/16-bit sound PCI

reviews.review_text: Really boring ship real time strategy
Bad, just bad. It's a very boring and dull game with few game mechanics and I suggest steering to port at 125 degrees before you hit this iceberg of a game.
